unit.title: Unit testing
unit.description: Testing individual functions or methods in isolation

component.title: Component testing
component.description: In-browser testing of individual UI components

integration.title: Integration testing
integration.description: Testing how multiple components work together to form layouts, or how a component interacts with a back-end function or API

e2e.title: End-to-end testing
e2e.description: In-browser testing of a complete user action flow from start to finish, usually in a dev or staging site

vr.title: Visual Regression testing
vr.description: Comparing the visual appearance of a component, template part, or page to a baseline to confirm intended changes and catch unintended ones
